channel.title: {PI} Server Integration
channel.description:
I have installed everything, but everytime I try to login my server it says "Unable to connect. Login server offline."
So what did I do wrong?
When I run the server it tells me "Mysql Connected." So I have no errors, but just connecting. Tell me what you need in order to help me or something.

item.title: {PI} Server Integration
item.dc:creator: @Drimestic_Comics Drimestic Comics
item.description:
@Drimestic_Comics wrote:

so it’s client sided? :palm:

Read full topic

item.title: {PI} Server Integration
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

It has nothing to do with MySQL. It’s your IP.
If you’re on local host (meaning the same pc as the server is running.) connect using: 127.0.0.1
If you’re on LAN (Local Area Connection) connect using: 192.168.X.X (Found in your computers network and sharing center).
If you’re on a computer outside of the local network, and not the same as the server, connect using: This ip here

The IP is to be placed into your client.

Read full topic
